title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: This thing done get out of hand , na we dey make this country hard for ourselves small scarcity of naira note we done take advantage they suffer our fellow average citizens, those big men no dey suffer this scarcity we dey suffer but na same us wey supposed help each other dey make life hard for each other, I go say make I withdraw 30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, things are getting from bad to worse and na the ordinary citizens they suffer am , let's not see every situation as an advantage to make money people dey hungry. You get money u no fit use am...wat a country.

comments.author: sokani
comments.created_time: February 02, 2023, 08:11:29 PMLast edit: February 02, 2023, 09:20:16 PM by sokani
comments.body: Imagine person wey get access bank no fit access him money. No money for bank, no money for ATM, no money for POS, Buhari don give us an unforgettable parting gift.Op, no vex ooo but I find this hard to believe because me no fit cough out this kind money give POS operator for just 30k transaction because na 10% dem dey charge for almost everywhere for my area wey be PH. Today sef I don perform 2 transactions using POS. I do 5k transaction at N400 and 6.5k at N600 and money wey dem charge me really pain me. The second person used my head, after agreeing that was going to do a transfer to him, las las the guy go call POS girl say make she collect the money, naso I come pay the charge. If to say na something wey I fit return I for just return am cuz the thing pain me.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: sokani on February 02, 2023, 08:11:29 PMImagine person wey get access bank no fit access him money. No money for bank, no money for ATM, no money for POS, Buhari don give us an unforgettable parting gift.Op, no vex ooo but I find this hard to believe because me no fit cough out this kind money give POS operator for just 30k transaction because na 10% dem dey charge for almost everywhere for my area wey be PH. Today sef I don perform 2 transactions using POS. I do 5k transaction at N400 and 6.5k at N600 and money wey dem charge me really pain me. The second person used my head, after agreeing that was going to do a transfer to him, las las the guy go call POS girl say make she collect the money, naso I come pay the charge. If to say na something wey I fit return I for just return am cuz the thing pain me.Na delta state ughelli and warri self call anybody around there and verify, 3hundred naira for one thousand naira, guy just ask anyone wey you know wey dey around, even if you wan use transfer or POS buy something them go request for their charge and that's very strange compare to how it was done before, them dey sell money now, even the oos people dey buy money , the money dey use for there POS business

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: My brother I feel your pain. The mata nah somtin wey if not handled quickly, e fit cause wahala. I face dis same issue when I go withdraw for POS after banks no gree dispense cash. E no go dey enof for CBN to order the release of new naira notes to be given OTC alone, but ensure say e go round. Imagine wetin I dey hear! Bandits get more access to the new naira notes pass the masses. Â Lai dis pesin hold moni but e no fit access am, and upon that, fuel still dey cost. Which way, naija??

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 07:51:29 PMThis thing done get out of hand , na we dey make this country hard for ourselves small scarcity of naira note we done take advantage they suffer our fellow average citizens, those big men no dey suffer this scarcity we dey suffer but na same us wey supposed help each other dey make life hard for each other, I go say make I withdraw 30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, things are getting from bad to worse and na the ordinary citizens they suffer am , let's not see every situation as an advantage to make money people dey hungry. You get money u no fit use am...wat a country.This one na normal situation wey we they do our selves. Nigerians they always take advantage what come their way if not how on earth person go charge you more than 20% of wetting u de withdraw? Na we average Citizens they make things worse for ourselves, those POS guys now go they think of how them go use this opportunity to make their own bastard money instead of them to support their fellow citizens to make life easy for them as this cash policy come with hardship.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Wetin deh still surprise me be how nobody don teach any of the POS operators lesson till now. Their own don too much pass all the goofs weh Grandpa Blu Bulaba deh make. Someone should teach those operators or bank staff small lesson. But e come be like say the problem na people weh deh insist on collecting the new naira notes, why not collect the old ones and move on. At least from now till February 10th deadline na. Me na small cash I deh hold, the rest na through my bank app I deh take transact.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: My dear,it is not funny at all, but sometimes it is their fault, I don't really blame them rather I blame The present government, because in a civilized country when things go wrong and the government find out that things are the way it supposed to be,they order the law enforcement agency to tackle the issues before it spread out and become the order of the day,but we are in a country whereby Those in authority are the ones who sponsors what ever happens in the country, because what do you expect a POS Man or woman who went to the bank to withdraw his money he or she will use in running his or her private business,at a time like this the same bank which he or she has been using started charging a POS Man or woman, what do we expect from that person to do when he or she comes back home, so we need serious prayer in this country oooh..

comments.author: Sexylizzy2813
comments.body: This one nah wetin the head of command no suppose allow to happen since before them say make we change our moni to new one, see as we dy use our own cash dy buy abi exchange our own moni...Like this this contri dy swim without control oh, infact this contri dy on autopilot.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 07:51:29 PMThis thing done get out of hand , na we dey make this country hard for ourselves small scarcity of naira note we done take advantage they suffer our fellow average citizens, those big men no dey suffer this scarcity we dey suffer but na same us wey supposed help each other dey make life hard for each other, I go say make I withdraw 30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, things are getting from bad to worse and na the ordinary citizens they suffer am , let's not see every situation as an advantage to make money people dey hungry. You get money u no fit use am...wat a country.Dem dey overdo am and everybody just wan cash out on the hype before everything dies down. I believe this scarcity no go last but make dem dey enjoy am while e dey on oh because na only God go judge this wickedness. I understand say Naira scarce and queue for banks long and to get Naira to run their pos business no dey but why dem go wicked their follow human being just because of that reason. Sha to avoid all this wahala, just carry yourself go bank very early so you fit withdraw money keep for hand as if you come anything more than 7-8 AM, before you fit comot bank go be by mid afternoon oh. Also try making use of the cashless policy wey the government dey try reinforce as e goes well. This days na only 5k I dey withdraw while I dey use app dey run transfer for any other businesses of the day.The only sad thing be say, bank wahala dun carry their own come. Every bank apps dun dey misbehave and na Kuda banks dey carry their own for head as if you check twitter, dem dey trend steadily due to their poor network that's causing the app to misbehave. I personally has been a victim so I understand how frustrated people are.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 10:56:44 PMNa delta state ughelli and warri self call anybody around there and verify, 3hundred naira for one thousand naira, guy just ask anyone wey you know wey dey around.Okay chief... The issue just dey get tougher and worse everyday, my guy tell me say him babe collect 50k and dem charge her 10k for this same ph so e almost close to wetin you yan. Today dem charge me 1k for 10k withdrawal wey I make and the cash no even dey, I gats waka like 7- 8 places before I see cash. The way this cash scarsity dey go we go just revert to trade by barter make we no say we dey go back to stone age.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: This matter don serious pass wetin I expect oh, where I start to see reality na yesterday night when I transfer small 1k to lose #200 as charge nai them debt me go show declined for the POS paper up till now I never see my moni wey come back. That same night we find where to even do 5k but my contri piple, we no see, no moni to take buy kerosine or any soup things even to refill gas self na war while the POS person say moni wey dy nai wetin him wan take survive say moni no dy. My God, I no believe say I chop food wey no done well cos no moni and night don cover to even take credit something, see as to even sleep well dy hard cos of say I chop food wey no boil well...

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on February 07, 2023, 03:16:41 AM This matter don serious pass wetin I expect oh, where I start to see reality na yesterday night when I transfer small 1k to lose #200 as charge nai them debt me go show declined for the POS paper up till now I never see my moni wey come back. That same night we find where to even do 5k but my contri piple, we no see, no moni to take buy kerosine or any soup things even to refill gas self na war while the POS person say moni wey dy nai wetin him wan take survive say moni no dy. My God, I no believe say I chop food wey no done well cos no moni and night don cover to even take credit something, see as to even sleep well dy hard cos of say I chop food wey no boil well...I dey tell you this POS guys no get chills, just to withdraw money you go end up spending almost half the money you wan withdraw, and all of them enter agreement as the same dey applicable everywhere, now for my area ATM machines no dey dispense money, bank sell money to this pos guys , I been wan do POS some days ago the woman was so inÂ  a hurry just because they call am say where she dey buy money the cash done dey available say make she come collect she was so rude about it, and I was like who are those selling this Money, now to withdraw na man know man, it's frustrating man.

comments.author: KiaKia
comments.body: Since dis craziness started I never withdraw from any POS, I just dey lucky to have buy plenty food for house wey fit carry me reach 6 months, if this nonsense reach 6 months I don enter am be that.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on February 07, 2023, 03:16:41 AM This matter don serious pass wetin I expect oh, where I start to see reality na yesterday night when I transfer small 1k to lose #200 as charge nai them debt me go show declined for the POS paper up till now I never see my moni wey come back. [~snipped~]I experienced the same thing the last time I went back home from school. I go POS make I withdraw small cash make I for hold make eh nor be like say I nor just get anything for hand at all at all nai I enter POS shop. After she press wetin she wan press finish for her machine I input my pin only for the machine to show declined and still yet I receive debit alert for my phone. The lady say even if heaven come down she nor dey give me shishi until I go bank go print statement of account come show her. And even the bank queue when dey too long nai make me just die the matter like that. But for my school environment we still dey manage for there Sha at least those ones the accept transfer for anything when you purchase so the issue of no cash nor really they affect us there. Nah only if we wan buy things when the price nor too high nai we dey use cash for.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 07:51:29 PM30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, The POS attendance wan carry you build house ?? Lol. The charge really high pass normal, for our end here the highest them they charge nah 2h for each 1k which no be everybody self they charge so, if u Waka for like 1-3 people you fit see who go take the least 150 for each 1k which that you 30k for be like 4.5k for the fee .But this 9k way them wan charge you nah 3h per 1k..Sometimes I no they too blame this POS people because nah Buy most of them they buy money to carry do business.

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 07:51:29 PMThis thing done get out of hand , na we dey make this country hard for ourselves small scarcity of naira note we done take advantage they suffer our fellow average citizens, those big men no dey suffer this scarcity we dey suffer but na same us wey supposed help each other dey make life hard for each other, I go say make I withdraw 30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, things are getting from bad to worse and na the ordinary citizens they suffer am , let's not see every situation as an advantage to make money people dey hungry. You get money u no fit use am...wat a country.Bros the thingÂ  done tire everybody with time the charges go come down and the problem now be say pos people self they suffer to collect money now bank apps too they misbehave, I buy something yesterday I run transfer I no see my package carry till the next day because the guy no see alert, na zenith bank people see shege pass today, I know even know waiting to talk again for this cash matter.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: This na real matter o, serious one way dey worry the whole nation as e be now and some Nigerians dey react crazily about the whole thing. E con be like say, na the first time way dem dey change money for this nation. The last time dem change money no get the kind effect way we dey get now and I wonder watin change.The only thing way dey play for my head be say, people don become too business minded and the corruption way dey for we country do make people to appreciate and use there office to dey take advantage of the masses. I hear for news yesterday say Efcc don go carry one bank manager with over #22m in raw cash of the new notes. Money way never go round, person don dey hoard am and the pos people cef, you no just know where them dey bring out the money from but, I no go surprise if na buy them dey buy way don make the charges dey very high.Only charge cef dey finish money when person never even use am do watin e for like use am do... d matter cast like that.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on February 07, 2023, 07:13:14 PMQuote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 07:51:29 PM30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, The POS attendance wan carry you build house ?? Lol. The charge really high pass normal, for our end here the highest them they charge nah 2h for each 1k which no be everybody self they charge so, if u Waka for like 1-3 people you fit see who go take the least 150 for each 1k which that you 30k for be like 4.5k for the fee .But this 9k way them wan charge you nah 3h per 1k..Sometimes I no they too blame this POS people because nah Buy most of them they buy money to carry do business. Omo me I done stop to do POS, na transfer I dey run now, I go just go the shop if you get waitin I wan buy I go ask you if you dey do transfer of you say no I goy way if you say yes I do the transfer, if waitin I buy na like 4300 I go transfer you 5k then you go give me the remaining 700 naira for hand make I carry see front I no fit shout o, this POS and there charges wan kill person come belike say na only charges person the withdraw.

comments.author: Dzwaafu11
comments.body: Guy everything for these country now na wuta wuta lol.Buh that POS wey charge you for 9K because you wan 30K e too much na.Sorry to say but most of POS people they amongÂ  people wey make these worst because.Now for my side some POS they even charge normal priceÂ  as them they do beforeÂ  before the scarcity of these note but we pray everything should come in order because these country don hard for people.Person with him money e no fit withdraw the thing they surprise me uptill now

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 02, 2023, 07:51:29 PMThis thing done get out of hand , na we dey make this country hard for ourselves small scarcity of naira note we done take advantage they suffer our fellow average citizens, those big men no dey suffer this scarcity we dey suffer but na same us wey supposed help each other dey make life hard for each other, I go say make I withdraw 30k and I was charged 9k how?? How did we get here? So when I remove 9k from 30k how much go come remain, things are getting from bad to worse and na the ordinary citizens they suffer am , let's not see every situation as an advantage to make money people dey hungry. You get money u no fit use am...wat a country.I no really blame this POS agents because most times I dey see the kind shit tem dey go through just to make small money dey available for us to use and for that alone Dem dey try aswear and some of them dey even sleep for ATM just to meet up with cash but Abeh make them also reduce the price Abeg no be we do am.I think the government should be the right ones we should declare war on and I think this is another great farewell message to is by the presidency.
